Uses of Package
fs.validate

Packages that use fs.validate
fs.polyglot.validate   
fs.validate   
 

Classes in fs.validate used by fs.polyglot.validate
AbstractComponentValidator
          This class provides a standard implementation to the class ComponentValidator.
ComponentValidator
          A ComponentValidator is an object that can verify the (usually user-generated) content of an object (supposedly a graphical component) and associate a boolean value to it, where true normally indicates a correct value.
Each ComponentValidator can be used for several components, registered via addComponent and to which he should add himself as a listener in some way.
LabelIndicValidator
          This class implements a ComponentValidator, where each registered component may be linked to a SwitchIconLabel, which is modified according to the validation status of the component.
ValidationResult.Result
           
 

Classes in fs.validate used by fs.validate
AbstractComponentValidator
          This class provides a standard implementation to the class ComponentValidator.
ComponentValidator
          A ComponentValidator is an object that can verify the (usually user-generated) content of an object (supposedly a graphical component) and associate a boolean value to it, where true normally indicates a correct value.
Each ComponentValidator can be used for several components, registered via addComponent and to which he should add himself as a listener in some way.
ValidationResult
          Represents the result of a validation run of a ComponentValidator.
ValidationResult.Result
           
ValidationValidator
          This class serves as a summarizing container for several ComponentValidators.
